body:
I have had `init_method=file://` hung on machines with many network adapters (some IB, some docker, ...). 
This is why `NCCL_SOCKET_IFNAME` could be quite life-saving for [NCCL](https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/nccl-developer-guide/index.html#ncclknobs)'s socket backend. Perhaps can you have a `PYTORCH_SOCKET_IFNAME` to avoid touching the network adapters that do not resolve at all (and thus hang)?
